1_week_in_valencia: 一星期夏令营在瓦伦西亚
about_us_text_1: We take young people on a unique journey, igniting their dreams through the power of sport and language by providing sports development tours and English courses for individuals, schools and clubs.
about_us_text_2: All designed to develop skills and confidence in youngsters no matter their ability.
advantage_description_1: 由经验丰富的英语外教和资深的足球教练组成的精英团队制定课程内容。
advantage_description_2: 足球是一种极具吸引力、振奋人心的运动。在轻松的语言环境中通过英语对话，激励我们的学生提高学习能力，产生学习兴趣。
advantage_description_3: 我们的教学方式侧重于培养学生在口语表达的能力和信心，用反复的视觉互动构成妙趣横生的教学系统。
advantage_description_4: 我们拥有一支优秀专业的外教团队，他们的教学方式充满活力和乐趣。
advantage_description_5: 如果您在课上或是课下有任何问题，我们的教师团队和课程顾问会在第一时间给予帮助。
copyrights: Copyright @ SP Sports Academy. All Rights Reserved.
description_1: Ben 是一位了不起的老师。 你可以在他的课上看到他对足球和英语的热情。 他们总是很有趣，充满活力，引人入胜。
description_2: Carlos是一位出色的教练和老师。 他做每件事都充满激情和活力。 我的孩子和他一起学习了 5 年，我看到他们的自信心和英语能力有了惊人的提高。
description_3: Joely是超越自我，对她的学生非常感兴趣。 她试图让我们从课程中获得最大的收获。 如果我必须从 0-10 给她打分，我会给她 10 分。太好了!
enjoy_top_level_Coaching: Enjoy top-level coaching games, activities, first-class football facilities and day trips
english_and_football_together: 英语和足球是打破两个陌生人距离感的金钥匙，也是不同民族和国家沟通的桥梁
experiential_learning_through_sport: Experiential learning through a sport that unites millions
football_coaching_text_p: 1-On-1 Football Coaching is a training programme which connects UEFA Licensed coaches with footballers of all abilities and ages for private coaching sessions. These sessions can be tailored either as a one-on-one session or small group sessions for boys and girls.
football_tour_text: Would you like to take your team to the UK or Spain for an unforgettable week training in an exciting new place, visiting stadiums and attractions and playing local teams?
get_started_with_these_steps: 现在就通过以下4个简单的步骤踏上学习之旅, 你的目标是说一口流利的英语！
include_heading_2: 博物馆门票和餐位预订
include_heading_4: 幕后花絮在体育馆之旅
include_heading_6: 导游陪同的城市观光之旅
online_english_classes_delevered: Online English classes delivered by experienced teachers who love teaching their native language through a sport they are passionate about.
online_english_text: through the context of football with native, experienced teachers
oganizing_trip: Each tour is bespoke to your budget and group size
oganizing_your_trip: UEFA & CELTA qualified Football coaches and English teachers
our_students_learn_how_to_communicate: 我们的学生以足球为主题来学习如何自信且正确地用英语交流
qualified_football_coaches_teachers: qualified Football coaches and English teachers
sign_up_now_spaces_limited: 现在注册. 席位有限.
step_description_1: 注册参加一次免费试课，我们将安排一位经验丰富的外教为您授课。
step_description_2: 您的专属课程顾问会及时通过微信与您联系，并安排试课时间。
step_description_3: Zoom是免费的教学应用程序，将其下载到您的设备上即可参与试课（鉴于课程互动性较强，我们建议您使用电脑。
step_description_4: 试课结束后，我们经验丰富的教师团队将根据学生的水平和年龄，合理分配英语学习小组。
step_heading_2: 我们会尽快与您取得联系
summer_camps_for_children: Summer camps for children aged 6 - 16 in
summer_camp_text: Football summer camps in ENGLISH. Registration open now for camps in Valencia in June and July 2022.
visit_major_cities_cities: 伦敦, 利物浦, 曼彻斯特, 巴塞罗那, 马德里
we_have_seen_proven_results: 我们的教学实践已经证明，将兴趣爱好与语言学习结合起来可以加快学习速度，增加学习乐趣
We_take_care_organising_trip: We take care of organising your trip
name: Name
